ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Follow up........
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Back when Solist was GM on Solusek Ro, Kollos lost his body. After a LOT of emailing by top members of the guild (who evidently knew some of the Verant
ygData.messageBody:
>Sounds like your experience with Sol Ro GM's mirrors my own.
>Basically they
>seem to be a do nothing lot. I've had a little better luck on E'ci, with
>the exception of the guy who told me I was obviously a game hacker and not
>to bother him anymore. Glad to hear you are mostly re-equipped.
>
> Kit

Back when Solist was GM on Solusek Ro, Kollos lost his body. After a LOT of
emailing
by top members of the guild (who evidently knew some of the Verant folks RL.
They
are game company, in the same (time and time again) -- and Kollos just about
quit because it took WEEKS to get settled, Solist finally reimbursed by
recreating. (I think it had gone beyond easy backup at that time) And that
was due to a game bug. so yeah. Sol Ro seems to be slow sometimes.
